LanguageData.Make_Moyo_Abyssteel.label: make abyssteel
LanguageData.Make_Moyo_Abyssteel.description: Make abyssteel, a commonly used alloy in the lighthouse. It is necessary for producing their items.
LanguageData.Make_AbyssPearl.label: make abyssal pearl
LanguageData.Make_AbyssPearl.description: Make abyssal pearl. A peculiar pearl of pure deepblue to be used in exotic products.
LanguageData.Make_Moyo_Depthweave.label: make depthweave
LanguageData.Make_Moyo_Depthweave.description: Make depthweave. A versitile fabric commonly used in the Lighthouse.
